channel.title: anyone know when AC: Brotherhood is out on PC
channel.description: can't find a lot on google concerning a release date. anyone got any ideas?

item.title: anyone know when AC: Brotherhood is out on PC
item.dc:creator: GuitarJim
item.description:
Ubisoft have relaxed their DRM to just require an online authentication on game start. Kind of like EA did with Mass Effect but I assume harder to work around.

It still leaves the game unplayable if you are offline for whatever reason which I don’t agree with at all hence why I don’t buy games with this kind of DRM.

Read full topic
